org.dblp.mmdb

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.Record
      • org.dblp.mmdb.Person

  • public class Person
extends Record
    A class representing dblp person records.

      java.lang.String getAggregatedMdate()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        protected Person(MmdbInterface dblp,
                 java.lang.String key,
                 int mdate,
                 byte[] xml,
                 PersonName[] names)
        Create a new Person.
        Parameters:
        dblp - The MMDB.
        key - The record key.
        mdate - The record mdate.
        xml - The dblp record as byte array, or null if an empty default template should be used.
        names - The PersonNames referenced in this record.

      • isDisambiguation

        public boolean isDisambiguation()
        Checks (heuristically) whether this person should be considered a disambiguation pseudo person.
        Returns:
        true if this person should be considered a disambiguation pseudo person, otherwise false.

      • hasPersonInfo

        public boolean hasPersonInfo()
        Checks whether this person record contains additional, non-trivial information. This includes:
        • alias names,
        • home page URLs,
        • notes, or
        • cite references
        Returns:
        true if this person contains additional information, otherwise false.
